column1: #text=Last week I went to the hairdresser and got my hair cut .
#text=When I got there , the receptionist told me I could have a seat and she 'd call me when it was time for my appointment .
#text=I flipped through a magazine , and about five minutes later my name was called .
#text=A woman gave me an apron to put on .
#text=The apron was to keep water and hair off my clothes during my appointment .
#text=She brought me over to a sink and sat me in front of it .
#text=The sink has a special notch so you can lean your head back comfortably .
#text=She wet my hair and shampooed it , then brought me to my stylist .
#text=I sat in a swivel chair in front of a mirror .
#text=The chair swivels so the stylist can turn me and reach different areas of my hair .
#text=She asked me how I 'd like my hair cut .
#text=I told her I 'd like her to cut a few inches off , and to give my hair some layers to fluff it up .
#text=She used special extra sharp hair-cutting scissors and cut my hair .
#text=Every so often , she - asked me how I liked it so far .
#text=When she finished , she gave a mirror to hold and turned the chair around .
#text=I was able to hold the mirror in front of my face , and at the same time , see the back of my head in the large mirror .
#text=I told her I was happy with the cut .
#text=She blew-dry my hair , and added some styling mousse .
#text=I gave her a tip , then I paid for the haircut at the front desk .
#text=I almost forgot to take off the apron before I left .
